subject: Re: Finally got something on EVPMkr!
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
The first one i hear "Arthur---employee airhole".  Maybe they are 
describing a situation while alive and we just aren't understanding 
correctly.  The second i hear "You forget the evil eye".  The last one 
i hear as you do.  Hey, this format beats hanging out the window to get 
a signal from the shack hack and it's clearer too.  I think when we get 
familiar with the speech from this, it's going to be fantastic.  Others 
should try this method as well, who live in a bad radio signal location.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin" <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
>
> I just posted three MP3 files in my folder (Kristin's Folder)from a
> session I did today using EVP Maker and the Allophones.  Please listen
> to see if you hear as I do.  I find this way much tougher to hear
> live... so I hope I am doign better!  Please let me know. THX!
> 
> k
> 
> The first one actually coincides with Margaret's.. ARTHUR EMPLOYS AIR
> HOLES.
> 
> The second ones says:  YOU ARE GETTING THE EVIL EYE
> 
> Third one says:  YOU ARE VALUABLE
> 
> Kristin
>
